sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import DashboardNavbar from './DashboardNavbar'; const PromoCodeManagement = () => { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const [promoCodeForm, setPromoCodeForm] = useState({ name: '', startDate: '', endDate: '', discount: '', }); const apiBaseUrl = 'http://ec2-52-66-186-107.ap-south-1.compute.amazonaws.com:3009'; useEffect(() => { const fetchPromocode = async () => { try { const authToken = localStorage.getItem('access'); if (!authToken) { throw new Error('Authentication token not found'); } const headers = { 'x-auth-token-admin': authToken, }; const response = await fetch(`${apiBaseUrl}/api/admin/getAllPromocodes`, { method: 'POST', headers: { ...headers, 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error(`HTTP error! Status: ${response.status}`); } const userData = await response.json(); setData(userData.results.promocodes); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching promo codes:', error); // Handle errors accordingly } }; fetchPromocode(); }, []); const formatDate = (dateString) => { const options = { day: 'numeric', month: 'numeric', year: '2-digit' }; return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-GB', options); }; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setPromoCodeForm({ ...promoCodeForm, [name]: value, }); }; const addPromocode = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const authToken = localStorage.getItem('access'); if (!authToken) { throw new Error('Authentication token not found'); } const headers = { 'x-auth-token-admin': authToken, 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }; const response = await fetch(`${apiBaseUrl}/api/admin/addPromocode`, { method: 'POST', headers, body: JSON.stringify(promoCodeForm), }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error(`HTTP error! Status: ${response.status}`); } const result = await response.json(); console.log(result); // Optionally, update the data state with the new promo code setData([...data, result.results.promocode]); // Clear the form fields setPromoCodeForm({ name: '', startDate: '', endDate: '', discount: '', }); } catch (error) { console.error('Error adding promo code:', error); // Handle errors accordingly } }; return ( <>

) } export default PromoCodeManagement
